sentences.en: Hold the digital thermo hygrometer for about 1 minute, until the reading becomes stable.
sentences.cn: 将电子温度湿度计拿出,等约1分钟, 直至读数稳定.

sentences.en: Hygrometer: An instrument for the measurement of the humidity of the atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 湿度计: 量度大气湿度的仪器.

sentences.en: If not, rest assured that at the time of purchase may require the use of wood hygrometer for humidity testing, this can be perfectly safe.
sentences.cn: 如果没有，请放心，在购买时可能需要使用木材湿度计湿度测试，这可以是绝对安全的。

sentences.en: Process temperature hygrometer table - -- in line with international standards of production process temperature, hygrometer table.
sentences.cn: 工艺温湿度计表 --- 生产符合国际标准的工艺温度 、 湿度计表.

sentences.en: The digital hygrometer designed in this way has features of simple configuration, less surrounding elements, powerful antijamming ability, little power loss, high reliability, rapid response and etc.
sentences.cn: 采用该方法设计的数字湿度计具有结构简单、外围电路少、抗干扰能力强、功耗小、可靠性高、速度快、反应时间短等优点。

words.tran_cn: 吸湿的；湿度计的；易潮湿的

trans.tran_en: any of various instruments for measuring humidity
